knimeNode.name: Speedy SMILES Dummy Atom Isotope to Atom Class Label
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to move dummy atom isotopes to atom class labels

intro.p: This node moves dummy atom isotope labels to atom classes. Where an atom class is already present, the atom is left unchanged. e.g. [3*] is converted to [*:3], but [3*:1] is left unchanged.

This node was developed by Vernalis Research . For feedback and more information, please contact
knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: If checked, then the input column is removed

ports.inPort: SMILES dummy atoms labelled by isotope
ports.outPort: SMILES dummy atoms labelled by atom class
